alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:11PM EDT until March 12 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 111 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles south of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Rock Hill, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Porter Lake, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Sylvania, Brock Crossroad and Red Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
